item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "It wasn't until I started reading and found books they wouldn't let us read in school that I discovered you could be insane and happy and have a good life without being like everybody else." -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "If you go home with somebody, and they don't have books, don't fuck 'em!" -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "Being rich is not about how much money you have or how many homes you own; it's the freedom to buy any book you want without looking at the price and wondering if you can afford it." -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "Life is nothing if you're not obsessed." -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "Sometimes I wish I was a woman, just so I could have an abortion." -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "Catholics have more extreme sex lives because they're taught that pleasure is bad for you. Who thinks it's normal to kneel down to a naked man who's nailed to a cross? It's like a bad leather bar." -- John Waters

item.title: Nico add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero
